attributes.action: create more opportunities for volunteers within hospitals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: volunteer placements at hospitals can have up to 6 month waiting lists which is useless to those who are willing to give up their own time to aid others and possibly relieve strain on the NHS. Volunteers can do many things which currently nurses or other NHS staff are required to do, taking up valuable time and decreasing NHS efficiency. I would like to see more placements for volunteers or new targets set by government for hospitals, regarding better volunteer services.
